attributes.action: It should be a rule that the England national football team manager should be English!
attributes.additional_details:
It should be a new rule set out to the FA that every new England national team manager should be English with English back room staff.
We don't want foreign managers running our national football team.
If the squad are all English its only correct that the manager should be english aswell.
We might actually win something!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.
